name: Black Box
short_description: Black Box is an application that analyses the technical parameters of subtitles in SRT/Subrip format. The user selects the limits for certain parameters, such as the line length, the minimum pause between two subtitles or the maximum reading speed, and the program shows those subtitles in a specific file that do not comply with those limits. Also, BlackBox includes some editing features with which the user can modify the subtitles that do not stand within an acceptable range, so that they can stay within normal values.
summary: Software app for the analysis of subtitles
